game_description: Out of the fog, zombies, aliens, ghosts, monsters and many other creatures are trying to eat you. Shoot them with your pistols! Power up after every wave! Don't die! Made with the Godot Engine.
review_1: First impressions review & gameplay here: https://youtu.be/aZhJV7aWD_c Great game! Love the whole Blaston-style bullet pacing and the big variety of monsters! Catchy music too!
